original_text: The entrance to the lowest floor was on the south side of the temple; a stairway led up to the middle level and from there to the third.
korean_text: 중층 골방의 문은 성전 오른쪽에 있는데 나사 모양 층계로 말미암아 하층에서 중층에 오르고 중층에서 셋째 층에 오르게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The entrance to the lowest floor
was on the south side of the temple
a stairway led up to the middle level
and from there to the third
